newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Taiwan seeks up to 500,000 bbls Jan/Feb reformate.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan seeks up to 500,000 bbls Jan/Feb reformate.

text.p: Taiwan's state-owned Chinese Petroleum Corp (CPC) has issued a tender to buy up to 500,000 barrels of 95-octane unleaded reformate for January-February delivery, a company official said on Tuesday.
The tender which closes December 16 and is valid for two days, seeks a 250,000-barrel cargo for delivery to Keelung or Taichung January 18-February 5 and or February 11-20.
"We may take one cargo in each time frame," said the official.
In its last tender, CPC bought a cargo of unleaded reformate from a European major at around $26.80 per barrel, cost-and-freight Taiwan for delivery January 1-15.
